      • selectRoom

        private Target selectRoom(java.util.List<Target> targets,
                          boolean skippable)
                   throws InputCancelledException
        Show room selection prompt to the user.
        Parameters:
        targets - a list of targets to show
        skippable - whether the action can be skipped
        Returns:
        a square belonging to the selected room
        Throws:
        InputCancelledException - thrown if the input is cancelled for timeout or other reasons

      • selectSquare

        private Target selectSquare(java.util.List<Target> targets,
                            boolean fetch,
                            boolean skippable)
                     throws InputCancelledException
        Show square selection prompt to the user.
        Parameters:
        targets - a list of targets to show
        fetch - true if ammoCards on each square should be shown, false otherwise
        skippable - whether the action can be skipped
        Returns:
        the selected square
        Throws:
        InputCancelledException - thrown if the input is cancelled for timeout or other reasons
